1.content: Research OpenStreetMap data access methods for UK street data
1.details: 1. Investigate Overpass API for querying UK streets 2. Research OSM data export options 3. Explore street data structure and available fields 4. Determine best data format and access method

2.content: Process and validate OSM street data for database import
2.details: 1. Create script to extract UK street data from OSM 2. Filter and clean street names (remove duplicates, invalid entries) 3. Extract metadata (county, post town, coordinates) 4. Format data to match database schema 5. Validate data quality

3.content: Import processed OSM street data into Supabase database
3.details: RESOLVED: Import issue completely fixed. Corrected duplicate detection logic to properly handle streets with same names in different locations (e.g., High Street, Orpington vs High Street, Chislehurst). Original import: ~19,000 streets. Corrected import: 63,300 streets (+44,300 improvement). Database now contains proper location-based uniqueness.

4.content: Set up automated OSM data updates (optional)
4.details: 1. Research incremental OSM data updates 2. Create automated script for periodic street data refresh 3. Implement change detection for new/modified streets 4. Set up scheduled updates if needed
